forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Slight chance of a rain shower. High near 15C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 59F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Slight chance of a shower late. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Slight chance of a shower late. Low around 50F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 59F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy at times with periods of rain. Low near 10C. Winds S at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain. Low around 50F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 53F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low around 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High around 55F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 50F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High around 55F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with light rain early. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with light rain early. Low near 45F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.
